main_definition: Cool is an informal term used to express approval, admiration, or a state of being moderately cold in temperature.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Expressing approval or admiration for something
meanings_and_examples.example: That's really cool! I love your new haircut.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A state of being moderately cold in temperature, often used as a compliment to describe someone's demeanor or behavior
meanings_and_examples.example: He always keeps his composure even when things get heated up – cool under pressure.
That new pair of sneakers is so cool, I want a pair too!

meanings_and_examples.definition: Accepting or tolerating something without enthusiasm
meanings_and_examples.example: I guess that's cool, but it doesn't excite me.
